title: Adobe Bridge CC 6.1.0.116 x86-x64 + patch-PainteR
description:
================
[INFO:]
================

Adobe Bridge CC 6.1.0.116 x86-x64 + patch-PainteR | 949 MB


Adobe Bridge CC provides centralized access to all multimedia resources necessary for creative projects. You can easily edit the components in batches, add watermark, and even centrally set the color options - Bridge will simplify your work and help maintain order.

Key features:
Adobe Mini Bridge. Use all necessary operating resources associated with the current project, using Adobe Mini Bridge (a custom toolbar that is included in InDesign CS5 and Photoshop CS5). Filter and sort, and then drag the files directly into the document.
Displays the linked file in the documents InDesign. Get quick access to any component of the page layout, with the ability to view the linked files in InDesign documents directly from Adobe Bridge CS5.
Export JPEG. Convert any graphic, image or document to JPEG format directly in Adobe Bridge CS5. This will allow to easily share files via websites and galleries, email, etc.
Resizing images and the use of watermarks to PDF for web galleries. Now, create a web gallery has become even more convenient. Adding watermarks to files PDF, accurate image resizing and display the names of files in the galleries of HTML-and SWF-format with one click.
Preview mobile content with Adobe Device Central CS5. Access Device Central CS5 from Adobe Bridge to preview, test, and optimize images, animations, video, and other content variety of devices, from mobile phones and game consoles to the TV screens.
More flexible batch renaming function. Quickly and easily rename a group of files using the updated batch rename dialog box. Create your own predefined styles, use the "Find and Replace", as well as customize the dialog box by dragging the field by dragging and dropping.
The possibility of drag and drop of resources between applications. Just put the files in Illustrator layouts InDesign, create new Smart Objects in Photoshop and perform many other operations by simply dragging files between Adobe Bridge CS5, Adobe Mini Bridge and other components of Creative Suite 5.
Editable panel "The Way." Now navigate through the folders become even more convenient thanks to an improved navigation bar.
Centralized configuration tsveta.Ustanavlivayte color settings on a centralized panel of Adobe Bridge, to ensure accurate color matching in the projects and files. This set of parameters controls the color settings in Photoshop CS5, Illustrator CS5, InDesign CS5 and Adobe Acrobat Ã‚Â® 9 Pro, so when you work in any of the components of Creative Suite, colors on the screen is almost completely identical.
